name: Tell me a Story (Exater5, fideos, Mad Umbra, RuthieLeyr)
name_original: Tell me a Story (Exater5, fideos, Mad Umbra, RuthieLeyr)
description:
Tell me a Story (Exater5, fideos, Mad Umbra, RuthieLeyr) is an action, adventure and puzzle game developed by Exater5, fideos and Mad Umbra. It was originally released in 2020.
Tell me a Story (Exater5, fideos, Mad Umbra, RuthieLeyr) is available on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
